attributes.action: Protect the graves of  civilians killed by enemy action during WW2
attributes.additional_details: This has already occurred at New Southgate and is threatened at Manor park.  We believe that these graves marked or not should be protected/ if need be by giving them listed status/ TO COMMEMORATE WHAT THE AMERICANS CALL THE GREATEST GENERATION
attributes.background: As many of the graves for those civilians who were killed by enemy action during WW2 were public graves in private cemeteries, and they are now unused for 75 plus years- it is possible that the cemetery can reclaim them. as they are effectively rented, and reuse them.
